Commander Shadowsun.name: Commander Shadowsun

unit.name: Agile Combatant
unit.description: This model is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back . Hero of the Empire (Aura): While a friendly T’AU EMPIRE unit is within 6" of this model, each time a model in that unit makes a ranged attack, re-roll a Hit roll of 1.

unit.name: Advanced Guardian Drone
unit.description: Each time a ranged attack targets the bearer, subtract 1 from the Wound roll .

unit.name: Command-link Drone (Aura)
unit.description: While a friendly T’AU EMPIRE unit is within 6" of the bearer, each time you select that unit as the target of a Stratagem , roll one D6: on a 5+, you gain 1CP.

default_wargear: 1 Commander Shadowsun – EPIC HERO This model is equipped with: flechette launcher; 2 high-energy fusion blasters; light missile pod; pulse pistol; battlesuit fists; advanced guardian drone; command-link drone.

Commander Farsight.name: Commander Farsight

unit.name: Way of the Short Blade
unit.description: While this model is leading a unit, each time a model in that unit makes an attack that targets an enemy unit within 9", add 1 to the Wound roll . Puretide's Teachings: Once per battle round , you can target this model’s unit with a Stratagem . If it does, reduce the CP cost of that use of that Stratagem by 1CP.

Commander Farsight.leader_info: This model can be attached to the following units: Crisis Fireknife Battlesuits Crisis Starscythe Battlesuits Crisis Sunforge Battlesuits
led_by: Crisis Fireknife Battlesuits Crisis Starscythe Battlesuits Crisis Sunforge Battlesuits
can_lead: the following units: Crisis Fireknife Battlesuits Crisis Starscythe Battlesuits Crisis Sunforge Battlesuits
default_wargear: 1 Commander Farsight – EPIC HERO This model is equipped with: high-intensity plasma rifle; Dawn Blade.

Longstrike.name: Longstrike

ranged.name: Twin smart missile system indirect fire twin-linked

unit.name: One Shot
unit.description: The bearer can only shoot with this weapon once per battle.

unit.name: Armour Hunter
unit.description: Each time this model makes an attack that targets a MONSTER or VEHICLE , add 1 to the Hit roll . Targeting Array: Each time this model is selected to shoot, you can re-roll one Hit roll or you can re-roll one Wound roll when resolving its attacks. XV02 Pilot Battlesuit: In your Command phase , you can select one friendly HAMMERHEAD GUNSHIP unit within 12". Until the start of your next Command phase, ranged weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [LETHAL HITS] ability.

default_wargear: 1 Longstrike – EPIC HERO This model is equipped with: 2 twin pulse carbines; railgun; armoured hull.

Cadre Fireblade.name: Cadre Fireblade

unit.name: Volley Fire
unit.description: While this model is leading a unit, add 1 to the Attacks characteristic of ranged weapons equipped by models in that unit. Crack Shot: Each time this model makes a ranged attack, on a Critical Wound , that attack has an Armour Penetration characteristic of -3.

Cadre Fireblade.leader_info: This model can be attached to the following units: Breacher Team Strike Team
can_lead: the following units: Breacher Team Strike Team
default_wargear: 1 Cadre Fireblade This model is equipped with: Fireblade pulse rifle; close combat weapon.

Commander in Coldstar Battlesuit.name: Commander in Coldstar Battlesuit

ranged.name: Airbursting fragmentation projector blast indirect fire

unit.name: Coldstar Commander
unit.description: While this model is leading a unit, models in that unit have a Move characteristic of 12" and ranged weapons equipped by models in that unit have the [ASSAULT] ability.

unit.name: Battlesuit Support System
unit.description: The bearer’s unit is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back , but when doing so only models equipped with this wargear can make ranged attacks .

unit.name: Shield Generator
unit.description: The bearer has a 4+ invulnerable save .

unit.name: Weapon Support System
unit.description: Each time the bearer makes a ranged attack, you can ignore any or all modifiers to the Hit roll .

unit.name: Turbo-jets

Ghostkeel Battlesuit.name: Ghostkeel Battlesuit

ranged.name: Twin T’au flamer ignores cover torrent twin-linked

unit.name: Stealth Drones
unit.description: Twice per battle, after an attack has been allocated to this model, you can change the Damage characteristic of that attack to 0. Designer’s Note: Place two Stealth Drone tokens next to the unit, removing one each time this ability has been used.

unit.name: Battlesuit Support System
unit.description: The bearer is eligible to shoot in a turn in which it Fell Back but it loses the SMOKE keyword.

default_wargear: 1 Ghostkeel Battlesuit This model is equipped with: fusion collider; twin T’au flamer; Ghostkeel fists.

Stealth Battlesuits.name: Stealth Battlesuits

unit.name: Forward Observers
unit.description: Each time this unit is an Observer unit , until the end of the phase, each time a ranged attack is made by a model in a Guided unit that targets their Spotted unit , re-roll a Hit roll of 1 and re-roll a Wound roll of 1.

unit.name: Homing Beacon
unit.description: Once per battle, you can use the Rapid Ingress Stratagem for 0CP. The target must be set up within 3" of the bearer’s unit and more than 9" away from all enemy units. Designer’s Note: Place a Homing Beacon token next to this unit, removing it once this ability is used.

default_wargear: 1 Stealth Shas’vre 4 Stealth Shas’ui Every model is equipped with: burst cannon; battlesuit fists.

Strike Team.name: Strike Team

unit.name: Suppression Volley
unit.description: In your Shooting phase , after this unit has shot, select one enemy INFANTRY unit hit by one or more of those attacks. Until the start of your next turn, while this unit is on the battlefield, that enemy unit is suppressed. While a unit is suppressed, each time a model in that unit makes an attack, subtract 1 from the Hit roll . DS8 Support Turret: In your Movement phase , if this unit Remains Stationary , until the start of your next Movement phase, its Fire Warrior Shas’ui model is equipped with the support turret missile system weapon. Designer’s Note: Place a Support Turret token next to this unit to remind you.

unit.name: This unit can be led by the following units
unit.description: Cadre Fireblade Ethereal Aun’shi

default_wargear: Suppression Volley: In your Shooting phase , after this unit has shot, select one enemy INFANTRY unit hit by one or more of those attacks. Pathfinder Team.name: Pathfinder Team

unit.name: Target Uploaded
unit.description: Each time a model in this unit makes an attack that targets their Spotted unit , improve the Ballistic Skill characteristic of that attack by 1 and that attack has the [IGNORES COVER] ability.

unit.name: Grav-inhibitor Drone
unit.description: Subtract 2 from Charge rolls made for any enemy unit that declares a charge against the bearer’s unit (this is not cumulative with any other reductions to that Charge roll).

unit.description: Add 6" to the Range characteristic of pulse carbines equipped by models in the bearer’s unit.

Devilfish.name: Devilfish

unit.name: One Shot
unit.description: The bearer can only shoot with this weapon once per battle.

unit.name: Rapid Deployment
unit.description: Units can disembark from this TRANSPORT after it has Advanced . Units that do so count as having made a Normal move that phase, and cannot declare a charge in the same turn, but can otherwise act normally in the remainder of the turn.

default_wargear: 1 Devilfish This model is equipped with: accelerator burst cannon; 2 twin pulse carbines; armoured hull.
Devilfish.transport_capacity: This model has a transport capacity of 12 T’AU EMPIRE INFANTRY models. It cannot transport BATTLESUIT , KROOT or VESPID STINGWINGS models.

Kroot Carnivores.name: Kroot Carnivores

unit.name: Fieldcraft
unit.description: At the end of your Command phase , if this unit is within range of an objective marker you control, that objective marker remains under your control, even if you have no models within range of it, until your opponent controls it at the start or end of any turn.

unit.name: This unit can be led by the following units
unit.description: Kroot Flesh Shaper Kroot Trail Shaper Kroot War Shaper Aun’shi

default_wargear: 1 Long-quill 9-19 Kroot Carnivores The 1 Long-quill is equipped with: Kroot pistol; Kroot rifle; close combat weapon. Every Kroot Carnivore is equipped with: Kroot rifle; close combat weapon.

Kroot Farstalkers.name: Kroot Farstalkers

unit.name: Bounty Hunters
unit.description: At the start of the battle, select one unit from your opponent’s army. Each time a model in this unit makes an attack that targets that unit, that attack has the [LETHAL HITS] and [PRECISION] abilities.

unit.name: Pech’ra
unit.description: Ranged weapons equipped by the bearer’s unit have the [IGNORES COVER] ability.
